title: Federated Learning and Wireless Communication Optimization Practical Course

context.prior_knowledge: Machine learning basics, wireless communication systems understanding, distributed computing concepts
context.additional_context: Acquiring optimization techniques to solve real-time data processing issues in mobile edge network environments.

learning_goals: Students can explain communication efficiency improvement strategies for federated learning (FL) tailored to wireless channel characteristics
Students can design solutions to the straggler problem using Reconfigurable Intelligent Surface (RIS) technology
Students can apply a federated learning (FL) convergence performance analysis framework that accounts for model aggregation errors to practical scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
